com.facebook.buck.io.filesystem

Interface ProjectFilesystemDelegate

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultProjectFilesystemDelegate, EdenProjectFilesystemDelegate

    public interface ProjectFilesystemDelegate
    Delegate that a ProjectFilesystem can use to leverage a specialized implementation of certain filesystem operations, tailored to the underlying filesystem. Use of the delegate is often motivated by performance reasons.

      • getDetailsForLogging

        com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<String,? extends Object> getDetailsForLogging()
        Returns:
        details about the delegate suitable for writing to a logger. It is recommended that the keys of this map are unique in namespace of the things a logger may want to log. Values must be String, int, or boolean.
